#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,j,s,a,b;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        a=0;
        s=0;
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            a=(a%1000000007)*10+7;
            s=(s%1000000007)+a;
        }
        s=s%1000000007;
        printf("%d\n",s);
    }
    return 0;
}
